data.message: I can't ever wait for the next Eminem album, always phenomenal. But.... I can't wait till Eminem makes another slim shady album with D12 and the gang... the world has gone hysterical, time to bring back the avatar of Chaos and shenanigans!

replies.message: Old Eminem is gone. He couldn't tap into old form if he wanted to. Just like Metallica can't be old Metallica, the moment is over no matter how bad all of us want it back!!
Naaaah im sure He could do it if he wanted to. Its friken Eminem!

or wait, Donny, youre onto something! As long as we tell him he cant do it, hes going to want to do it to prove us otherwise... NOPE! he cant Do it! He cant bring old sLIm! NooOooOPE! ::nudges others to follow along:: lol
Not sure if D12 will ever come back since Proof died.
so sad :( but that should be even more reason to reunite.
He doesn't need to be the old Eminem anymore. He's no longer that angry youthful person. He's 44 now and quite possibly the greatest rapper we've ever seen. Sit back and enjoy it. 👍🏻

Idk about you man... but I feel like he's slowly coming back to his old self. Kinda hear it in some of his latest stuff but D12 on the other hand, that's a no go for sure! Obviously cause of Proof. That was the bro to Em and doubt he'd wanna go back to that without Proof.

True, but I'm not saying he has to change to old Eminem y'all. He's a rap god he can do whatever the fuck he wants, but it's been a loooong time since he's come out with a gag album, like "ass like that", "will the real slim shady" "purple hills" etc. Every new rapper now days trys so hard to be serious, Eminems already serious, even when he's not!
